name: Close-Grip Bench Press
how_to: Lie flat on a bench, grip the barbell with hands shoulder-width apart, lower the bar to your chest, and press it back up.

name: Dips
how_to: Use parallel bars, lower your body by bending your elbows until your shoulders are below your elbows, and push back up.

name: Tricep Pushdown
how_to: Stand facing a cable machine with a rope or straight bar attachment, grip the attachment with an overhand grip, and push it down until your arms are fully extended.

name: Overhead Tricep Extension
how_to: Hold a dumbbell or a rope attachment on a cable machine overhead with both hands, lower it behind your head by bending your elbows, and extend your arms back up.

name: Skull Crushers
how_to: Lie flat on a bench, hold an EZ curl bar or dumbbells with an overhand grip, lower the weight to your forehead by bending your elbows, and extend your arms back up.

name: Tricep Kickback
how_to: Hold a dumbbell in one hand, bend forward at the hips, keep your upper arm parallel to the floor, and extend your arm back until it is straight.

name: Close-Grip Push-Up
how_to: Place your hands close together on the floor, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground, and push back up.

name: Cable Overhead Extension
how_to: Attach a rope to a low pulley, face away from the machine, hold the rope behind your head with both hands, and extend your arms overhead.

name: Single-Arm Dumbbell Overhead Extension
how_to: Hold a dumbbell in one hand overhead, lower it behind your head by bending your elbow, and extend your arm back up.

name: Bench Dip
how_to: Sit on a bench with your hands next to your hips, slide your hips off the bench, lower your body by bending your elbows, and push back up.
